## projekt folder get

Get project folder by short name

```
projekt folder get [short name] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for get
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.projekt/config.yaml)
  -d, --debug           Enable verbose ouput
```
